name: Space Raiders (itch) (CooperFryar, ej6638, rykoh)
description:
Space Station Studios brings you a game that is out of this world! Space Raiders is the next best arcade style game that allows you to defeat enemy ships to collect new parts and upgrade your own along the way. You are one of the few remaining humans on Earth that must explore different planets to find the pulse crystal that can turn back time, saving the human race. Pick up power-ups and new parts to survive and upgrade your ship in order to be prepared for the alien leader who possesses the crystal.

Explore new planets fighting off enemy aliens in search of their leader by flying around and shooting the enemy ships. Pick up power-ups to survive the level and continue moving forward. Collect parts from defeated enemies to upgrade your ship and become stronger. Keep searching for the enemy leader in order to save the human race.
